messages.title: Standing up for you across Leicester South
messages.content: As your local MP I have helped thousands of people in Leicester South with a whole range of issues - from education to housing to immigration. I love Leicester, it's where I live and where I am proud to bring up my family. I am proud of our city's history and excited about our future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To protect the NHS from devastating cuts by the Tory government and ensure it remains there for us all.
Local schools are still facing further cuts and I will stand up to make sure our children have the best start in life.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This Labour-democratic in his site. Don't waste it's to stop him.

issues.education: Local schools are still facing further cuts and I will stand up to make sure our children have the best start in life.
issues.health: To protect the NHS from devastating cuts by the Tory government and ensure it remains there for us all.

community.content: I love Leicester, it's where I live and where I am proud to bring up my family. As your local MP I have helped thousands of people in Leicester South with a whole range of issues - from education to housing to immigration.

leaflet.personalStatement: I love Leicester, it's where I live and where I am proud to bring up my family.

contactInformation.address: Leicester South Labour Party, 23 Hotel Street, Leicester, LE1 5AW

endorsement: "John has been a strong MP fighting for us for 7 years. He’s on our side whether it’s jobs, housing, the NHS or crime he always fights for us in Leicester." - VirgeRani, Freya Maxwell

examples: thousands of people in Leicester South
I love Leicester, it's where I live and where I am proud to bring up my family.
To protect the NHS from devastating cuts by the Tory government and ensure it remains there for us all.
Local schools are still facing further cuts and I will stand up to make sure our children have the best start in life.
This election is about your future.
This Tory has supported cutting taxes for big companies whilst raising taxes for you and me.
I am prepared to stand up for Leicester South.
As your local MP I have helped thousands of people in Leicester South with a whole range of issues - from education to housing to immigration.
I love Leicester, it's where I live and where I am proud to bring up my family.
Local schools are still facing further cuts and I will stand up to make sure our children have the best start in life.
Jon has been a strong MP fighting for us for 7 years. He's on our side whether it's jobs, housing, the NHS or crime he always fights for us in Leicester.
To protect the NHS from devastating cuts by the Tory government and ensure it remains there for us all.
